privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information
privacyPolicy.intro: Charitable foundation "Way to future UA" (hereinafter referred to as "we" or "the Foundation") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting the personal data you provide. This privacy policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and how we store it.

section1.title: 1. What Information do we collect?
section1.intro: We may collect and process the following personal data:
section1.item1: When you fill out a feedback form, we may collect your first name, last name, and contact information (phone number, email).
section1.item2: When you make a voluntary donation or charitable contribution, we may collect payment information.
section1.item3: Data automatically collected when you visit our website (IP address, cookies, browsing behavior).

section2.title: 2. How dow we use your information?
section2.intro: The information collected is used for the following purposes:
section2.item1: To provide you with information about our services and activities;
section2.item2: To process your inquiries and feedback;
section2.item3: To manage donations and financial support to the Foundation;
section2.item4: To improve website functionality and personalize the user experience.

section3.title: 3. Sharing of personal data
section3.content: We will not transfer, sell, or disclose your personal data to third parties without your consent, unless otherwise required by Ukrainian law.

section4.title: 4. Data security
section4.content: We take all necessary technical and organizational measures to prevent unauthorized access, loss, or alteration of your personal data.

section5.title: 5. Your rights
section5.item1: Request access to the data we hold about you;
section5.item2: Request correction or deletion of your personal data;
section5.item3: Withdraw your consent to data processing.

section6.title: 6. Cookies policy
section6.content: Our website uses cookies to collect statistical information and optimize the user experience. You can manage your cookie settings in your browser.

section7.title: 7. Changes to the privacy policy
section7.content: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy, and all changes will be published on this page.

section8.title: 8. Contact information
section8.intro: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us:

publicAgreement.title: Public Agreement
publicAgreement.description: Terms and conditions for charitable donations
publicAgreement.intro: This agreement is an official public offer applicable to individuals visiting https://alexzaiwukelan.org.ua/ who wish to make charitable donations. The offer is presented by the charitable organization "Way to future UA," signed by head Mykyta Zhalnin.

publicOffer.definition: official proposal from the Foundation published on the Website requesting unlimited individuals to make charitable donations.

acceptance.definition: occurs when a Donor makes payment via Website tools or transfers funds to the Foundation's account; acceptance happens upon receipt of funds.

donation.definition: voluntary, gratuitous transfer of funds/property by Donor to Foundation supporting its objectives under Ukraine's Law "On Charitable Activities and Charitable Organizations."

seller.definition: Charitable foundation "Way to future UA" (registration code 44947699), located at: Ukraine, 52005, Dnipropetrovsk region, Dnipro city, Slobozhanske village, St. Heroes of Ukraine, 27c.

section2.title: 2. SUBJECT OF THE AGREEMENT
section2.content: The agreement stipulates voluntary, gratuitous monetary donations supporting the Foundation's legitimate goals and charitable aid programs per Ukrainian law and the Foundation's statute. Donors independently determine donation amounts with no expectation of economic benefit or commercial transactions.

section3.title: 3. ACCEPTANCE OF THE OFFER
section3.content: Donors accepting confirm familiarity with the Foundation's statute (available on Website) and agree the Foundation may use donated funds portions for administrative expenses within legally established limits. Per Civil Code Articles 207, 639(2), 641, and 642, charitable donations are concluded upon offer acceptance. Written agreements aren't mandatory for validity.

section4.title: 4. FOUNDATION RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS
section4.right1: Accept and use charitable donations per offer and agreement
section4.right2: Change donation direction within legal activities
section4.right3: Use donation portions for administrative expenses without additional consent, respecting legal limits
section4.obligation3: Protect Donor personal information; non-disclosure to third parties without consent except legally required

section5.title: 5. DONOR RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS
section5.right1: Make charitable donations to Foundation account per agreement
section5.right2: Request Foundation reports regarding donation use
section5.obligation1: Carefully read offer terms and applicable rules before donating

section6.title: 6. PLACE AND TERMS OF COLLECTING CHARITABLE DONATIONS
section6.content: Per Ukraine's Law "On Charitable Activities and Charitable Organizations" (Article 7), donations can be collected worldwide. Collection occurs on Foundation territory, continuing until Foundation liquidation or new terms establishment.

section7.title: 7. METHODS OF MAKING CHARITABLE DONATIONS
section7.content: Foundation provides electronic payment options on Website or bank transfer (IBAN UA103052990000026009050580853). Donors choose one-time or regular donations (cancelable anytime). Payments complete upon bank/payment system confirmation. Donors bear related expenses.

section8.title: 8. USE OF CHARITABLE DONATIONS
section8.content: Foundation uses funds per statutory objectives with independent distribution rights. Donors/representatives may monitor donation use. Donated funds are non-refundable.
